Posts.Content: Jellie wrote: My diagnostic mammogram is on Wednesday. It seems like forever away and the time is passing so slowly. All I can think of is breast cancer... even though I know the odds are likely in my favour. I have been trying VERY hard not to obsessively check my lump, but last night did and found near my lump two large squishy lumps, which remind me of the nodes that swell in my neck when I have a cold. They weren't palpable last week. How do you pass the time? Log in to post a reply
Posts.Title: How do you handle the waiting? Jellie MelissaDallas
